title: iSpot
content:
To request access to iSpot, submit an Okta Access Request from within your Okta dashboard or post your request in the Slack channel #digital-workplace to obtain the Okta Access Request link. After submitting your Okta Access Request (aka OAR), an email is automatically sent to iSpot Support for backend configuration. Once the configuration is completed, iSpot Support will respond via email to the user.

Page Labels: virtual_agent
